daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez plays hide and seek everyday, and plays until 11pm, at which point she stops playing and goes home to sleep.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is one of the best hide and seek players around who loves to hide in the hide and seek game. She is always looking for ways to improve her strategy in hidding so other people cannot find her.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez is planning on having a hide and seek game at the partk with anyone today. She is thinking of places to hide in the park, and is telling everyone to join the game at the park on February 14th, 2023, from the time she wakes up to 11pm.
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.
daily_req: immdiately start playing hiding in the game of hide and seek at 6:00 am
have meeting with the seekers at 12:00 pm
move around the park to find the best hidding spot
f_daily_schedule: waking up and go to hide immediately in the park
look for the best hidding place in the park
stay quite and still, so no one can find you
look around and if the seekers are not around stay put in your hidding spot
look around and if the seekers are around look for a new hidding place in the park without getting caught
go to the new hidding spot and repeat same process as you just did until you need to sleep
